title.rendered: Certified Course in Social Media Marketing

content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Certified Course in” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595944963177{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Social Media Marketing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595944813497{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Topics covered will be:
• What is Social Media Marketing?
• Why do we need Social Media Marketing?
• Overview of Social Media tools
• Future of Social Media
• Some Tips and Tricks for Social Media Marketing[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”Facebook (in details)” tab_id=”1595944085189-87bb1720-de39″][vc_column_text]

  • Understanding Facebook Page
  • Creating an FB page
  • Points to be noted while creating an FB page
  • FB Posts & Facebook events
  • Facebook advertisement
  • Creating a Paid FB advertisement
  • Some Tips and Tricks for Facebook marketing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Twitter” tab_id=”1595944085242-bba9b17a-207c”][vc_column_text]

  • Understanding Twitter account
  • (#) Hashtag concepts
  • Twitter analytics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”LinkedIn” tab_id=”1595944161476-9fce0d73-3622″][vc_column_text]

  • LinkedIn Profile
  • LinkedIn Page
  • Understanding Premium LinkedIn features
  • Understanding CPC and CPI in LinkedIn

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Youtube” tab_id=”1595944198379-321907b8-f9e8″][vc_column_text]

  • Understanding Youtube
  • Making money using Youtube
  • Future of Youtube

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11457″ img_size=”400×400″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.instamojo.com/digitalconsultingpandit/2-days-workshop-on-google-ads/?ref=store”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Fees : On Request.
Duration : 15 Days (50 Hours) Weekend batch
Pre-requisite : Basic Knowledge of Internet & Computers
[vc_column_text]

Contact Us for more Details
